description:
Microphone + Recording turns your iOS device into a microphone.

Plug the output of device's headphone jack into powered speakers, a mixing console, home stereo, etc and start the show.

Noteworthy:
* Record yourself while using microphone.
* Backup records using iTunes USB file sharing, over WIFI or by email.
* Share recordings on Facebook, Twitter, Tumbir and Foursquare with SoundCloud.
* Manage recording, rename, delete or replay.
* Two Graphics Modes: Graphic equalizer and old school microphone.
* Mute Button - for use with an external cable only.
* Retina display support.
* Simple to use interface.
* Microphone + Recording works with or without an external cable.
* Ads

*** FEEDBACK ***

"Work amazingly when I am using it the first time with my fm transmitter to dj our Christmas eve party. Impressive. Make live simple" - USA

"Guter Sound. Und der kann gespeichert werden. Mehr habe ich mir bei dieser app nicht versprochen. Also 5 Sterne" - Germany

"Tout simplement génial ! Un des écouteurs sert de micro, l'autre (dans une oreille) sert pour le contrôle. Posé sur la table, l'oreillette micro permet d'enregistrer la conversation ambiante avec une bonne qualité." - Frace

"Pipo súper wena la aplicacion salva demasiado a todos esos q algún día les gusto cantar en u XD" - Chile

"Buono!! In caso di necessità funziona bene, nelle emergenze nn è male!!! Bella app" - Italy

"Приложение просто супер, я давно искала нечто подобное. Качество записи 5++. Спасибо автору." - Russia

You can extract recordings with iTunes USB file sharing:
Use this way to extract recorded files:
1. Connect your iPad to any computer with iTunes (it's even on someone else iTunes with other iPhones).
2. You don't need to sync or anything else.
3. Your iPad name should appear on the left side 
4. Select apps tab.
6. In the bottom, you'll see apps that uses iTunes USB file sharing.
7. Microphone + Recording should appear thier, and you'll find recorded files
releaseNotes:
- Minor bug fixes
- In app purchase to remove ads
